text: Mack 10 (born Dedrick D'Mon Rolison on August 9, 1971) is an American rapper. He has sold almost 11 million records worldwide. Mack 10 was a member of Westside Connection. He was born in Los Angeles. He is of African and Mexican descent. ==References== Category:Rappers from Los Angeles Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:20th-century American rappers Category:Actors from Los Angeles County, California Category:Singer- songwriters from California
title: Mack 10
